ygData.subject: Re: [EQCheats] ShowEQ?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes I heard of it. And, I have seen it in use. It displays all zone info complete with mobs... mob names... their level... their hit points... what they
ygData.messageBody:
--- Trevalien Stormchaser <trevalien@...>
wrote:
> I was at a college recently and in the dorms one of
> the students was runing
> a program called showEQ it displayed lots of
> mob/zone info and gave you an
> overhead view of the zone and a list of items on
> each mob...i have never
> heard of this...has anyone else? it runs on linux...
>
> Trevalien
>
Yes I heard of it. And, I have seen it in use. It
displays all zone info complete with mobs... mob
names... their level... their hit points... what they
are carrying.... your amount of experience you are
getting for each kill.... your percentage of
experience towards your next level.. even PC's and
their pets. You simply click on the mob you wish to
attack and a line is drawn on the show EQ map from
your position to the mab and you simply folllow the
line. They did have a Windows version available taht
would run in the background of Everquest. But,
everyone was getting busted with it. And, you CAN get
busted with the Linux one too. My friend did. So use
at your own risk.
-Ken
